Custom.description: Generates anything based on customized input and instruction.
Custom.interface: custom(input: str, instruction: str) -> dict with key 'response'

AnswerGenerate.description: Generates step-by-step reasoning and final answer.
AnswerGenerate.interface: answer_generate(input: str) -> dict with keys 'thought' and 'answer'

Programmer.description: Automatically writes and executes Python code.
Programmer.interface: programmer(problem: str, analysis: str = 'None') -> dict with keys 'code' and 'output'

ScEnsemble.description: Uses self-consistency to select the most frequent solution.
ScEnsemble.interface: sc_ensemble(solutions: List[str], problem: str) -> dict with key 'response'

Test.interface: test(problem: str, solution: str, entry_point: str) -> dict with keys 'result' and 'solution'

Review.description: Reviews and provides feedback on a solution.
Review.interface: review(problem: str, solution: str) -> dict with keys 'review_result' and 'feedback'

Revise.interface: revise(problem: str, solution: str, feedback: str) -> dict with key 'solution'
